mapper.insert: insert into shoppingcart (scno, rno, count, rdate, menuno, mno ) values (shoppingcart_seq.nextval, #{rno }, #{count }, sysdate, #{menuno }, #{mno })
mapper.select: select menu.rno, menu.menuno, title, explanation, spiciness, file1, price, shoppingcart.rdate from menu, shoppingcart, members where shoppingcart.menuno = menu.menuno and shoppingcart.mno = members.mno members.mno=#{mno }
